unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhaka mhozo IFSC code *portun* visron gello! Khorench itlen kothin asa 11 aksharam yaad dovrunk? Zalear hunvem mhozo bank account number (SB1234567890) ani CIF number (1234567) mhajea baahuncheaacher tattoo korun gheunk favo sulabh pravesha khatir. ðŸ˜‰
normalised: Arre yaar, mhaka mhozo I-F-S-C code portun visrun gelo! Khorench tea egar (eleven) characters-ank yaad dovornem itlem kotthinn asa? Huenv mhozo bank account number S-B ek don tin char panch so sat atth no ani shunyo ani C-I-F number ek don tin char panch so sat sohojek mellonk mhazo baaicho hatacher tattoo korunk zai ashen distha.
text: Arre yaar, mhaka mhozo IFSC code *portun* visronk zalo! Tem khorench itlench kathin asa 11 akshoram ukttea dolean dovorchem? Mhaka tanka tankanchem bank account number (SB1234567890) ani CIF number (1234567) mhajea hatacher tattoo korunk zata sopea dharan mellonk.
